body_html: #7679 Tracking progress on another issue. We will have both in one script that allows you to try different options, e.g. data formats, ps placement and variable update options. I would love to release it now as I know many people are really interested. Closing this issue to keep tracking on the other one.

I would love to release it now as I know many people are really interested.  Closing this issue to keep tracking on the other one.
body: #7679 Tracking progress on another issue.  We will have both in one script that allows you to try different options, e.g. data formats, ps placement and variable update options.  I would love to release it now as I know many people are really interested.  Closing this issue to keep tracking on the other one.
